Episodes.Title: Off the Baa!
Episodes.Plot: When a cabbage bounces into the field from a passing truck, Shaun and his pals decide to use it as a football, with little help from the pigs.

Episodes.Title: Bath Time
Episodes.Plot: Who likes a freezing bath? Noone! Shaun and pals go commando and do everything they can to have a hot relaxing sheep dip!

Episodes.Title: Shape up with Shaun
Episodes.Plot: Shirley the Sheep is the biggest sheep on the farm, but Shaun hopes to change that, can you keep up with Shaun?

Episodes.Title: Timmy in a Tizzy
Episodes.Plot: Timmy the little lamb is distraught when the farmer take's his favourite toy, can Shaun and pals get it back?

Episodes.Title: Scrumping
Episodes.Plot: Those pesky pigs have taken all the apples, and wont let the sheep have one - they didn't count on Shaun!

Episodes.Title: Still Life
Episodes.Plot: The farmer's turned artist, but will Shaun and pals play along?

Episodes.Title: Mower Mouth
Episodes.Plot: Goats will eat anything, including the sheep's grass - whilst they look on in horror!

Episodes.Title: Take Away
Episodes.Plot: Sheep can't order pizzas, can they? Noone told Shaun and pals, as they strip the scarecrow and head off into town.

Episodes.Title: The Bull
Episodes.Plot: Shaun turns matador when a new addition joins the flock.

Episodes.Title: Saturday Night Shaun
Episodes.Plot: It's partytime when Shaun finds the farmer's old records, who knew sheep could boogie down?

Episodes.Title: The Kite
Episodes.Plot: What's more fun than a kite on a windy afternoon? Nothing when Shaun and pals are concerned.

Episodes.Title: Little Sheep of Horrors
Episodes.Plot: Little lambs shouldn't watch scary movies, as Timmy finds out to his cost.

Episodes.Title: Buzz off Bees
Episodes.Plot: Something's different around the field, Shaun and the flock decide to investigate.

Episodes.Title: Fleeced
Episodes.Plot: It's time for a haircut for Shaun and his pals, but is the Farmer really the right man for the job? Not after his first attempt!

Episodes.Title: Shaun Shoots the Sheep
Episodes.Plot: Shaun finds a camera and sets about taking everyone's photos, whether they want it or not. Are there some prima donnas among the flock?

Episodes.Title: Big Top Timmy
Episodes.Plot: Little Lamb Timmy joins the circus tonight, but will he make it in show business?

Episodes.Title: Fetching
Episodes.Plot: With Bitzer head over tails in love with a local lass, can Shaun keep the flock in order?

Episodes.Title: Mountains Out of Molehills
Episodes.Plot: With the flock in a dancing mood, not even a molehill can spoil their fun... or can it?

Episodes.Title: Who's the Mummy?
Episodes.Plot: Shaun finds himself out of his depth when newly hatched chicks believe he's their mummy, aw.

Episodes.Title: Things That go Bump
Episodes.Plot: Strange noises are scaring the flock, Shaun goes to investigate...

Episodes.Title: Abracadabra
Episodes.Plot: When the Farmer decides to throw out his magic set, Shaun decides to put on a show - but things get out of hand when the flock start disappearing!

Episodes.Title: Sheep on the Loose
Episodes.Plot: Nearly all the sheep take the bus to the funfair. Shaun and Shirley must convince the Farmer that the flock is out to pasture.

Episodes.Title: Wash Day
Episodes.Plot: The sheep use the farmer's clotheshorse as a merry-go-round - the garments get dirty and have to be washed before the farmer returns.

Episodes.Title: The Visitor
Episodes.Plot: When a strange space craft crash-lands on the farm, Shaun and co. help its little green occupant get air-borne again.

Episodes.Title: Shaun the Farmer
Episodes.Plot: The Farmer is sick in bed, so, with Bitzer playing nurse-maid, it's down to Shaun to handle the daily chores around the farm - with disastrous results.

Episodes.Title: Tooth Fairy
Episodes.Plot: Bitzer get a terrible tooth pain. Shaun takes the job as dentist but does not succeed. After a successful extraction at the vet Bitzer hope the Tooth Fairy will give him a coin.

Episodes.Title: Bitzer Puts His Foot In It
Episodes.Plot: The farmer has Bitzer guard some freshly laid concrete - but Shaun and the flock treat it as a Walk of Fame

Episodes.Title: Hiccups
Episodes.Plot: Shirley drinks Bitzer's lemonade too fast and gets the hiccups. Shaun tries to help with all the usual tricks, and the usual results.

Episodes.Title: If You Can't Stand the Heat
Episodes.Plot: It is a scorching hot day, and the Flock is desperate to cool down in the Sheep Dip. There's only one thing in their way: the sun-bathing Farmer!

Episodes.Title: Sheepwalking
Episodes.Plot: It is a peaceful night at the farm, until Shaun starts to walk in his sleep. The Flock cannot resist their natural instinct to follow, and chaos soon ensues.

Episodes.Title: Tidy Up
Episodes.Plot: The sheep's field is in a mess, and the Farmer tells Bitzer to clean it up - but he makes the mistake of getting Shaun and company to help.

Episodes.Title: The Farmer's Niece
Episodes.Plot: When the Farmer's Niece comes to stay, Shaun and Bitzer soon discover she isn't as cute and adorable as she seems.

Episodes.Title: Camping Chaos
Episodes.Plot: An unfriendly camper sets up his tent in the sheep's field. When he goes off exploring, Shaun and the Flock decide to do some exploring of their own.

Episodes.Title: Helping Hound
Episodes.Plot: The Farmer decides to get a robotic sheep-dog, but when it turns out to be even stricter than Bitzer, Shaun decides it has to go.

Episodes.Title: Troublesome Tractor
Episodes.Plot: The tractor seems to be ready for the scrap heap and the farmer wishes he could afford to buy a new one. So the sheep overhaul it...

Episodes.Title: Stick with Me
Episodes.Plot: Bitzer glues the Farmer's broken glasses back together - but when the Flock get their hooves on the tube of glue, things start to get very sticky.

Episodes.Title: Heavy Metal Shaun
Episodes.Plot: The farmer inspects the lawn with a metal detector. When Shaun and Bitzer try it, they discover a metallic threat behind a hedge.

Episodes.Title: Snore-Worn Shaun
Episodes.Plot: Shirley's snoring is keeping the flock awake, so Shaun decides that the only way to get a peaceful night's sleep is to get her out of the barn.

Episodes.Title: Shaun Encounters
Episodes.Plot: Two alien kids land at the farm one night and run riot. Can Shaun and Bitzer stop them before they wake the Farmer?

Episodes.Title: Save The Tree
Episodes.Plot: The Farmer wants to turn the tree in Shaun's field into firewood. So the Flock must take desperate measures to stop their beloved tree getting felled.
